text: Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known.
author: Carl Sagan

text: The cosmos is within us. We are made of star-stuff.
author: Carl Sagan

text: To confine our attention to terrestrial matters would be to limit the human spirit.
author: Stephen Hawking

text: The most incomprehensible thing about the universe is that it is comprehensible.
author: Albert Einstein

text: Not only is the Universe stranger than we think, it is stranger than we can think.
author: Werner Heisenberg

text: The Earth is the cradle of humanity, but mankind cannot stay in the cradle forever.
author: Konstantin Tsiolkovsky

text: The universe is under no obligation to make sense to you.
author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

text: The universe is filled with magical things patiently waiting for our wits to grow sharper.
author: Eden Phillpotts

text: Exploration is in our nature. We began as wanderers, and we are wanderers still.
author: Carl Sagan

text: We are all connected; to each other, biologically; to the earth, chemically; to the universe, atomically.
author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

text: Curiosity is the essence of our existence.
author: Gene Cernan

text: The sky is not the limit; it's just the beginning.
author: Kalpana Chawla

text: The good thing about science is that it's true whether or not you believe in it.
author: Neil deGrasse Tyson
